definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Danburite is also useful in the repair of the will centers in ascension.
sentences.chinese: 賽黃晶在提升中對意願中心的修復也有幫助。

sentences.english: However, as the world is too quiet, and not in line with the wishes of Juesao syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 但那樣世界太安靜了，不符合狂燥症候羣的意願。

sentences.english: He possessed that will and purpose which are the invariable forerunners of success.
sentences.chinese: 他擁有這種意願和目標，這正是成功不變的先決條件。

sentences.english: We couldn't keep them here against their will.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能違反他們的意願，強留他們在這裏。

sentences.english: Palermo and rumblings of a proposal from southern city Bari followed.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒莫和南部城市巴里也不甘落後地表示了申辦意願。

sentences.english: Hasa strong commitment to a career in Aviation technology.
sentences.chinese: 有投身航空技術領域的強烈意願。

sentences.english: The representatives of both sides reciprocated formal expressions of goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 雙方代表相互表達了禮節性的友好意願。

sentences.english: The willingness of the ex-leader and the successor will also influence the results of the succession.
sentences.chinese: 前任和繼任主體的交接意願影響到繼任的效果。

sentences.english: Strengthen your will with religious beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 用宗教信仰來夯實你的意願。

sentences.english: The emperor respected her will and held a grand marriage for her.
sentences.chinese: 齊愍王完全尊重她的意願，爲她舉行了盛大的婚禮。

sentences.english: Just be thankful that his intention is to please you in the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 只要明白他的意願是要在牀上取悅於你而已。

sentences.english: You can repeat this for as many attributes as you like.
sentences.chinese: 您可以按照自己的意願爲許多屬性重複相同的操作。

sentences.english: Ban said earlier this month that he wanted a second term.
sentences.chinese: 在本月初，潘基文表示連任意願。

sentences.english: He married her against the will of his parents.
sentences.chinese: 他違背父母的意願與她結了婚。

sentences.english: Ignore people who try to dissuade you from following through on your idea.
sentences.chinese: 不必理會那些勸止你按照自己意願做事情的人。

sentences.english: The selection of pictures in this exhibition presents Wei Lai's aspiration.
sentences.chinese: 本次展覽作品的選擇，也代表了攝影師魏來的意願。

definition: right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
